Meteor.Graphics

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • Meteor.Graphics.Context

  • public class Context
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the heart of the rendering engine. A master BufferedImage is created using the ARGB color model with DataBufferInt. Each pixel is rendered onto the screen using the 32-bit integer color model. An image is represented by an array of size width * height, and rendering is accomplished by the transformation of pixel data from bitmap pixel array to the master image. The master image is then draw using Java2D Graphics object onto the canvas. Dimensions for the render context is different to the dimension of the wrapper, but a resize of the wrapper should not update the size of the context. The size of the context refers to the dimensions of the master image.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Context(int width, int height)
      Creates a render context with given dimensions.

        public Context(int width,

        Parameters:

        height - Height of the context, in pixels.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the context with the default black color.

      • renderBitmap

        public void renderBitmap(Bitmap bitmap,
                         int x,
                         int y)
        Draws a given bitmap to the context. Transfers the pixel data from the bitmap to the specified location on the context.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - Bitmap to be rendered.
        x - x-coordinate on screen.
        y - y-coordinate on screen.

      • renderBitmap

        public void renderBitmap(Bitmap bitmap,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         float alpha)
        Draws a given bitmap to the context. In addition, the pixel alpha is modified to the one provided, giving transparency effects.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - Bitmap to be rendered.
        x - x-coordinate on screen.
        y - y-coordinate on screen.
        alpha - Alpha value desired (0f - 1f).

      • renderBitmap

        public void renderBitmap(Bitmap bitmap,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         int tintColor)
        Draws a given bitmap to the context. In addition, the bitmap is tinted with a given color.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - Bitmap to be rendered.
        x - x-coordinate on screen.
        y - y-coordinate on screen.
        tintColor - Color used to tint the bitmap.

      • renderBitmap

        public void renderBitmap(Bitmap bitmap,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         float alpha,
                         float scale)
        Draws a given bitmap to the context. In addition, the bitmap has custom scaling and transparency.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - Bitmap to be rendered.
        x - x-coordinate on screen.
        y - y-coordinate on screen.
        alpha - Transparency of the bitmap.
        scale - Custom scaling of the bitmap (1.0f is 1:1 ratio).

      • renderBitmap

        public void renderBitmap(Bitmap bitmap,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         float alpha,
                         int tintColor)

        Parameters:
        bitmap - Bitmap to be rendered.
        x - x-coordinate on screen.
        y - y-coordinate on screen.
        alpha - Transparency of the bitmap.
        tintColor - Custom scaling of the bitmap (1.0f is 1:1 ratio).

      • renderBitmap

        public void renderBitmap(Bitmap bitmap,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         float alpha,
                         float scale,
                         int tintColor)
        Draws a given bitmap onto the context. In addition, the bitmap has custom scaling, transparency and color tinting.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - Bitmap to be rendered.
        x - x-coordinate on screen.
        y - y-coordinate on screen.
        alpha - Transparency of the bitmap.
        scale - Scale factor of Bitmap (1.0f is 1:1 ratio).
        tintColor - Custom scaling of the bitmap (1.0f is 1:1 ratio).

      • renderText

        public void renderText(java.lang.String text,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       int color,
                       float scale)
        Draws a line of text to the screen with custom color and scaling. Additionally, the 
        '\n'
        character can be used to switch to a new line.
        Parameters:
        text - Text to be drawn on screen.
        x - x-coordinate on screen.
        y - y-coordinate on screen.
        color - Color of the text.
        scale - Custom scaling per glyph (1.0f is 1:1 ratio).

      • renderText

        public void renderText(java.lang.String text,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       int color,
                       float scale,
                       float alpha)
        Draws a line of text to the screen with custom color, scaling and transparency. Additionally, the 
        '\n'
        character can be used to switch to a new line.
        Parameters:
        text - Text to be drawn on screen.
        x - x-coordinate on screen.
        y - y-coordinate on screen.
        color - Color of the text.
        scale - Custom scaling per glyph (1.0f is 1:1 ratio).
        alpha - Alpha transparency of the text (between 
        0f
        and 
        1.0f
        .
